narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative and Joe Kovach, ACI.
Applicant wishes to be licensed as a class "A" breeder.
Please issue a class A license.
License fee and a copy of this report must be mailed to: 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care, 920 Main Campus Dr. Suite 200 Raleigh, NC 27606
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
